title: Easy slow cooker Thai chicken with basil
ingredients: ['900g skinless, boneless chicken breasts, cubed', '1 red pepper, cut into strips', '4 tablespoons soy sauce', '2 tablespoons fish sauce', '3 fresh red Thai chilli peppers, finely chopped', '1 tablespoon freshly squeezed lime juice', '1 tablespoon rice vinegar', '1 tablespoon finely grated fresh ginger', '20g chopped Thai basil, or to taste', '1 pinch salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste']
